message.content:
Implement the following plan: # Plan: Migrate BOS-ARSA to Eleventy (11ty) ## Context The BOS-ARSA website has 4 HTML pages with massive code duplication — nav, footer, CSS variables, font-face declarations, favicons, and JS are copy-pasted across every file. Adding a new page means copying 150+ lines of boilerplate. The press page has 6 hand-coded article cards that will grow over time. SEO files (robots.txt, sitemap.xml, llms.txt) are also manually maintained. **Goal:** Migrate to Eleventy (11ty) — a zero-config static site generator that outputs plain HTML. The nginx/Docker deployment stays identical, we just add a build step. ## Why Eleventy - Zero-config, minimal dependencies (~1 npm package) - Nunjucks templating: layouts, partials, loops, data files - Output is plain static HTML — served by nginx exactly as before - JSON data files for press articles (add article = add JSON entry) - Can generate sitemap.xml, robots.txt, llms.txt from templates - No client-side framework — same HTML output as today ## New Project Structure ``` bosarsa/ ├── src/ │ ├── _includes/ │ │ ├── base.njk # Full HTML document shell │ │ ├── nav.njk # Full navigation (logo, links, hamburger) │ │ └── footer.njk # Full 3-column footer │ ├── _data/ │ │ ├── site.json # Global: name, url, email, address, ZVR, etc. │ │ └── presse.json # Press articles array │ ├── css/ │ │ └── base.css # All shared CSS (vars, fonts, nav, footer, responsive) │ ├── index.njk # Homepage │ ├── presse.njk # Press page (loops over presse.json) │ ├── impressum.njk # Impressum (content only, layout from base) │ ├── datenschutz.njk # Datenschutz (content only, layout from base) │ ├── robots.njk # -> robots.txt │ ├── sitemap.njk # -> sitemap.xml (auto-lists all pages) │ └── llms.njk # -> llms.txt (pulls from site.json) ├── fonts/ # Stays in root (passthrough copy) ├── favicon/ # Stays in root (passthrough copy) ├── *.mp4, *.png, *.webp # Static assets (passthrough copy) ├── .eleventy.js # Eleventy config ├── package.json # Just @11ty/eleventy ├── Dockerfile # Multi-stage: node build -> nginx serve ├── docker-compose.yml # Unchanged ├── deploy-production.sh # Unchanged └── nginx.conf # Unchanged ``` ## Key Files ### 1. `src/_data/site.json` — Single source of truth ```json { "name": "BOS-ARSA", "fullName": "Österreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben", "legalName": "BOS-Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria (BOS-ARSA)", "url": "https://bosarsa.oeradio.at", "email": "office@bos-arsa.at", "address": { ... }, "zvr": "1783847541", "vereinsbehoerde": "Landespolizeidirektion Kärnten" } ``` ### 2. `src/_data/presse.json` — Data-driven press articles ```json [ { "date": "22. April 2022", "tag": "blog", "tagLabel": "Blog", "title": "Not- und Katastrophenfunk — ...", "url": "https://www.mh-is.at/?p=1158", "source": "mh-is.at — OE3EGH und OE3XEG", "desc": "Ausführlicher Überblick..." } ] ``` ### 3. `src/_includes/base.njk` — Single layout for all pages - `` with fonts, CSS, favicons, SEO meta (title, description, canonical, OG, Twitter) - Includes `nav.njk` and `footer.njk` - Content block for page-specific content - Shared JS at bottom (lucide, year, hamburger, scroll) - Front matter controls: `title`, `description`, `canonical`, `activeNav`, `pageCSS` ### 4. `src/presse.njk` — Loop replaces 6 copy-pasted cards ```nunjucks {% for article in presse %}
{{ article.date }} {{ article.tagLabel }}

{{ article.title }}

{{ article.source }}

{{ article.desc }}

 {% endfor %} ``` ### 5. SEO files — Generated from data - **sitemap.njk**: Loops over 11ty's `collections.all` to auto-list all pages - **robots.njk**: Simple template referencing `site.url` - **llms.njk**: Pulls org info from `site.json`, board members, etc. ### 6. `Dockerfile` — Multi-stage build ```dockerfile FROM node:20-alpine AS build WORKDIR /app COPY package*.json ./ RUN npm ci --production COPY . . RUN npx @11ty/eleventy FROM nginx:alpine RUN rm /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf COPY nginx.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/bosarsa.conf COPY --from=build /app/_site/ /usr/share/nginx/html/ EXPOSE 80 ``` ### 7. `.eleventy.js` — Config - Input: `src/`, Output: `_site/` - Passthrough copy: `fonts/`, `favicon/`, `*.mp4`, `*.png`, `*.webp`, `nginx.conf` - Nunjucks as template engine ## Also update impressum & datenschutz Both currently have the old simple nav/footer. They'll get the full nav and full footer from the shared includes — consistent with presse.html and index.html. ## What stays the same - `nginx.conf` — identical - `docker-compose.yml` — identical - `deploy-production.sh` — identical - All static assets (fonts, favicons, videos, images) - The final HTML output looks exactly the same to visitors ## Implementation Steps 1. `npm init` + install `@11ty/eleventy` 2. Create `.eleventy.js` config 3. Create `src/_data/site.json` and `src/_data/presse.json` 4. Create `src/css/base.css` with all shared styles 5. Create `src/_includes/base.njk`, `nav.njk`, `footer.njk` 6. Convert `index.html` -> `src/index.njk` 7. Convert `presse.html` -> `src/presse.njk` (data-driven loop) 8. Convert `impressum.html` -> `src/impressum.njk` 9. Convert `datenschutz.html` -> `src/datenschutz.njk` 10. Create `src/robots.njk`, `src/sitemap.njk`, `src/llms.njk` 11. Update `Dockerfile` to multi-stage build 12. Update `.gitignore` (add `_site/`, `node_modules/`) 13. Delete old root HTML files 14. Test build locally, verify output matches current site 15. Deploy ## Verification 1. Run `npx @11ty/eleventy` — should produce `_site/` with all files 2. Compare `_site/index.html` output with current `index.html` 3. Verify `_site/presse.html` renders all 6 articles 4. Verify `_site/sitemap.xml`, `_site/robots.txt`, `_site/llms.txt` content 5. Deploy and verify live site at https://bosarsa.oeradio.at If you need specific details from before exiting plan mode (like exact code snippets, error messages, or content you generated), read the full transcript at: /home/achildrenmile/.REDACTED.jsonl

content.text: I'll start by reading the existing HTML files to extract all the content, styles, and structure needed for the migration. Let me read everything in parallel.

file.content:
BOS-ARSA Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria

  • Videos
  • Vorstand

  • Mitglied werden
  • Presse
  • Kontakt

Presse & Medien

Berichte, Artikel und Podcasts über BOS-ARSA in chronologischer Reihenfolge

22. April 2022 Blog

Not- und Katastrophenfunk — Verschiedene Notfunkkonzepte im Überblick

mh-is.at — OE3EGH und OE3XEG

Ausführlicher Überblick über verschiedene Notfunkkonzepte in Österreich mit einem eigenen Abschnitt über BOS-ARSA bzw. ADL820. Beschreibt, wie BOS-ARSA Angehörige von Rettungsorganisationen, Feuerwehr und Polizei als Funkamateurinnen und Funkamateure ausbildet.
10. Dezember 2021 Podcast

BOS-ARSA, Ausbildung

ON AIR — Amateurfunk D-A-CH Podcast, Staffel 2, Folge 1 — Host: Michael Wurzinger (OE3CMW), Gast: Lukas Spitzer (OE8LSR)

Lukas Spitzer berichtet über Aus- und Weiterbildung innerhalb der BOS-ARSA Gruppe und die Schnittstellen zwischen dem ÖVSV-Notfunksystem und den Leitstellen der Sicherheitsorganisationen.
27. November 2021 Podcast

BOS-ARSA, Notfunkbrücke zu den Blaulichtorganisationen

ON AIR — Amateurfunk D-A-CH Podcast, Staffel 1, Folge 12 — Host: Michael Wurzinger (OE3CMW), Gast: Wolfgang Gabrutsch (OE8GWQ)

BOS-ARSA Obmann Wolfgang Gabrutsch stellt das Notfunkprojekt vor — eine Brücke zwischen dem Amateurfunk und den Funkdiensten der Blaulichtorganisationen für den Krisenfall.
September 2021 Ausbildung

Amateurfunkkurs — 8 Einsatzkräfte erfolgreich lizenziert

Österreichische Wasserrettung Kärnten

BOS-ARSA organisierte einen fünftägigen Amateurfunkkurs bei der Rot-Kreuz-Rettungsstelle in Ferlach. Acht Einsatzkräfte der Wasserrettung bestanden die Prüfung und erhielten die CEPT-Lizenz. Die neuen Operatorinnen und Operatoren unterstützen künftig den Katastrophenschutz.
13. Juli 2021 Artikel

BOS-ARSA und NOTFUNK — Fachgespräch in Kärnten

ÖVSV — Österreichischer Versuchssenderverband — Kevin Mekul (OE8KKM)

Bericht über ein Fachgespräch zum Thema Notfunk am Pressegger See. Beim Blaulicht-Stammtisch in Bleiburg wurde die Einrichtung einer Funkstelle im Krisenmanagementzentrum der Bezirkshauptmannschaft Völkermarkt besprochen.
28. April 2021 Artikel

Kurzwelle & Co: Die Welt der Funkamateure

MeinBezirk.at — Klagenfurt Land — Bernhard Knaus

Regionaler Zeitungsartikel über die Welt des Amateurfunks mit Oberst Wolfgang Gabrutsch im Mittelpunkt. Berichtet über die Gründung von BOS-ARSA 2019, die rund 80 Mitglieder und den Aufbau von Relaisfunkstellen mit autonomer Stromversorgung für die Krisenkommunikation.
BOS-ARSA

Österreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben – BOS-Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria (BOS-ARSA)

c/o Wolfgang Gabrutsch
9020 Klagenfurt am Wörthersee, Buchengasse 3

Zuständige Vereinsbehörde: Landespolizeidirektion Kärnten
ZVR-Zahl: 1783847541

      unicode-range: U+0100-02BA, U+02BD-02C5, U+02C7-02CC, U+02CE-02D7, U+02DD-02FF, U+0304, U+0308, U+0329, U+1D00-1DBF, U+1E00-1E9F, U+1EF2-1EFF, U+2020, U+20A0-20AB, U+20AD-20C0, U+2113, U+2C60-2C7F, U+A720-A7FF;
    }
    *, *::before, *::after { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; }

    :root {
      /* Austrian Police Uniform Blues — derived from Bundespolizei dunkelblau */
      --polizei-dark:    #0F1A2E;   /* Deepest navy — near-black uniform shadow */
      --polizei-navy:    #1B2A4A;   /* Standard Austrian police uniform dark blue */
      --polizei-blue:    #2B4370;   /* Lighter uniform blue — daylight appearance */
      --polizei-mid:     #3A5A8C;   /* Mid-blue for interactive elements */
      --polizei-light:   #4A7AB5;   /* Bright blue accent — hover / links */
      --polizei-pale:    #6B9DD6;   /* Pale blue for soft highlights */

      /* Austrian flag red + BOS-ARSA logo gold */
      --at-red:          #C8102E;   /* Austrian Bundesfarbe Rot */
      --bos-gold:        #D4A843;   /* Gold from BOS-ARSA logo lettering */
      --bos-gold-light:  #E0BE6A;   /* Lighter gold for hover */
      --bos-gold-dark:   #B8912E;   /* Darker gold for active */

      /* Neutrals */
      --white:           #FFFFFF;
      --off-white:       #F4F6F9;
      --gray-100:        #E8ECF1;
      --gray-200:        #D0D7E0;
      --gray-300:        #A8B4C2;
      --gray-500:        #5C6B7F;
      --gray-700:        #374151;
      --gray-900:        #111827;

      --font-main: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif;
      --font-mono: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace;
      --container: 1140px;
      --nav-h: 72px;
      --radius: 2px;
    }

    html { scroll-behavior: smooth; scroll-padding-top: var(--nav-h); }

    body {
      font-family: var(--font-main);
      color: var(--gray-700);
      background: var(--off-white);
      line-height: 1.65;
      -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    }

    img { max-width: 100%; display: block; }
    a { color: var(--polizei-light); text-decoration: none; transition: color .2s; }
    a:hover { color: var(--polizei-pale); }
    a:focus-visible { outline: 2px solid var(--polizei-light); outline-offset: 2px; }

    .container { max-width: var(--container); margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 24px; }

    /* ===== Scroll Reveal ===== */
    .reveal {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(24px);
      transition: opacity .6s ease, transform .6s ease;
    }
    .reveal.visible { opacity: 1; transform: none; }

    /* ===== Nav ===== */
    .nav {
      position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; z-index: 1000;
      background: var(--polizei-dark);
      height: var(--nav-h);
      transition: box-shadow .3s, background .3s;
      border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.04);
    }
    .nav.scrolled { box-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(0,0,0,.35); }
    .nav__inner { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; height: 100%; }

    .nav__brand {
      display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px;
      text-decoration: none; color: var(--white);
    }
    .nav__brand:hover { color: var(--white); }
    .nav__brand-logo {
      height: 44px;
      width: auto;
      border-radius: var(--radius);
    }
    .nav__brand-text {
      display: flex; flex-direction: column; line-height: 1.15;
    }
    .nav__brand-name {
      font-weight: 800; font-size: 1.25rem; letter-spacing: .5px;
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }
    .nav__brand-sub {
      font-size: .65rem; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: .3px;
      color: var(--gray-300); white-space: nowrap;
    }

    .nav__links { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 4px; list-style: none; }
    .nav__links a {
      display: block; padding: 8px 16px;
      color: var(--gray-300); font-size: .875rem; font-weight: 500;
      letter-spacing: .2px; border-radius: var(--radius);
      transition: color .2s, background .2s; text-decoration: none;
    }
    .nav__links a:hover { color: var(--white); background: rgba(255,255,255,.06); }

    .nav__hamburger {
      display: none; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center;
      gap: 5px; width: 40px; height: 40px;
      background: none; border: none; cursor: pointer; padding: 6px;
    }
    .nav__hamburger span {
      display: block; width: 100%; height: 2px;
      background: var(--gray-300); transition: transform .3s, opacity .3s;
      border-radius: 1px;
    }
    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(1) { transform: translateY(7px) rotate(45deg); }
    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(2) { opacity: 0; }
    .nav__hamburger.active span:nth-child(3) { transform: translateY(-7px) rotate(-45deg); }

    /* ===== Hero ===== */
    .hero {
      position: relative;
      min-height: 100vh;
      display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
      background: var(--polizei-dark);
      overflow: hidden;
      padding: calc(var(--nav-h) + 48px) 24px 80px;
    }

    /* Gradient overlay for depth */
    .hero::before {
      content: '';
      position: absolute; inset: 0;
      background: radial-gradient(ellipse at 30% 50%, rgba(43,67,112,.4) 0%, transparent 60%),
                  radial-gradient(ellipse at 70% 80%, rgba(27,42,74,.6) 0%, transparent 50%);
      z-index: 1;
    }

    /* Subtle grid lines */
    .hero__grid {
      position: absolute; inset: 0;
      background-image:
        linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,.025) 1px, transparent 1px),
        linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,.025) 1px, transparent 1px);
      background-size: 80px 80px;
      z-index: 1;
    }

    /* Radio waves — concentric circles pulsing outward */
    .hero__waves {
      position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      z-index: 1; pointer-events: none;
    }
    .hero__wave {
      position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%;
      width: 160px; height: 160px;
      margin: -80px 0 0 -80px;
      border: 1.5px solid rgba(212,168,67,.1);
      border-radius: 50%;
      animation: pulse 5s ease-out infinite;
    }
    .hero__wave:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 1.25s; }
    .hero__wave:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 2.5s; }
    .hero__wave:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 3.75s; }
    @keyframes pulse {
      0% { width: 160px; height: 160px; margin: -80px 0 0 -80px; opacity: .45; }
      100% { width: 1400px; height: 1400px; margin: -700px 0 0 -700px; opacity: 0; }
    }

    .hero__content {
      position: relative; z-index: 2;
      text-align: center; max-width: 780px;
    }

    .hero__logo {
      width: 420px; max-width: 80vw;
      height: auto;
      margin: 0 auto 36px;
      border-radius: 4px;
      box-shadow: 0 8px 40px rgba(0,0,0,.3);
    }

    .hero__title {
      font-size: clamp(1.8rem, 4.5vw, 3rem);
      font-weight: 800; color: var(--white);
      line-height: 1.15; letter-spacing: -.3px;
      margin-bottom: 16px;
    }
    .hero__title span { color: var(--bos-gold); }

    .hero__subtitle {
      font-size: clamp(.95rem, 1.8vw, 1.15rem);
      color: var(--gray-300); font-weight: 400;
      line-height: 1.65; max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto 40px;
    }

    .hero__actions { display: flex; gap: 14px; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; }

    /* ===== Buttons ===== */
    .btn {
      display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px;
      padding: 13px 28px; font-family: var(--font-main);
      font-size: .875rem; font-weight: 600; letter-spacing: .3px;
      border: 2px solid transparent; border-radius: var(--radius);
      cursor: pointer; transition: all .2s; text-decoration: none;
    }
    .btn:focus-visible { outline: 2px solid var(--polizei-light); outline-offset: 2px; }

    .btn--gold {
      background: var(--bos-gold); color: var(--polizei-dark);
      border-color: var(--bos-gold);
    }
    .btn--gold:hover {
      background: var(--bos-gold-light); border-color: var(--bos-gold-light);
      color: var(--polizei-dark); transform: translateY(-1px);
      box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(212,168,67,.25);
    }

    .btn--outline-white {
      background: transparent; color: var(--white);
      border-color: rgba(255,255,255,.25);
    }
    .btn--outline-white:hover {
      border-color: var(--white); color: var(--white);
      background: rgba(255,255,255,.05); transform: translateY(-1px);
    }

    .btn--polizei {
      background: var(--polizei-mid); color: var(--white);
      border-color: var(--polizei-mid);
    }
    .btn--polizei:hover {
      background: var(--polizei-light); border-color: var(--polizei-light);
      color: var(--white); transform: translateY(-1px);
      box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(74,122,181,.25);
    }

    /* ===== Austrian flag stripe accent ===== */
    .at-stripe {
      height: 4px; width: 100%;
      background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--at-red) 33.33%, var(--white) 33.33%, var(--white) 66.66%, var(--at-red) 66.66%);
    }

    /* ===== Sections ===== */
    .section { padding: 96px 0; }
    .section--alt { background: var(--white); }
    .section--dark {
      background: linear-gradient(170deg, var(--polizei-navy) 0%, var(--polizei-dark) 100%);
      color: var(--white);
    }

    .section__header { text-align: center; margin-bottom: 56px; }
    .section__label {
      display: inline-block;
      font-family: var(--font-mono); font-size: .72rem;
      letter-spacing: 3px; text-transform: uppercase;
      color: var(--bos-gold); margin-bottom: 10px;
    }
    .section__title {
      font-size: clamp(1.6rem, 3.5vw, 2.2rem);
      font-weight: 800; line-height: 1.2; color: var(--gray-900);
    }
    .section--dark .section__title { color: var(--white); }
    .section__rule {
      width: 48px; height: 3px; background: var(--bos-gold);
      margin: 14px auto 0; border-radius: 1px;
    }
    .section__intro {
      max-width: 640px; margin: 20px auto 0;
      color: var(--gray-500); font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.7; text-align: center;
    }
    .section--dark .section__intro { color: var(--gray-300); }

    /* ===== Video ===== */
    .video-wrapper {
      max-width: 860px;
      margin: 0 auto;
      border-radius: var(--radius);
      overflow: hidden;
      box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(15,26,46,.12);
      border: 1px solid var(--gray-100);
      background: var(--polizei-dark);
    }
    .video-player {
      width: 100%;
      display: block;
    }

    /* ===== Feature Cards (Über uns) ===== */
    .features { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3,1fr); gap: 24px; }
    .feature-card {
      background: var(--white); border: 1px solid var(--gray-100);
      border-radius: var(--radius); padding: 36px 28px;
      transition: transform .25s, box-shadow .25s;
      position: relative;
    }
    .feature-card::after {
      content: ''; position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0;
      height: 3px; background: var(--polizei-mid);
      transform: scaleX(0); transform-origin: left; transition: transform .35s;
    }
    .feature-card:hover {
      transform: translateY(-3px);
      box-shadow: 0 8px 28px rgba(15,26,46,.08);
    }
    .feature-card:hover::after { transform: scaleX(1); }

    .feature-card__icon {
      width: 48px; height: 48px;
      display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
      background: var(--polizei-navy); color: var(--bos-gold);
      border-radius: var(--radius); margin-bottom: 18px;
    }
    .feature-card__title {
      font-size: 1.05rem; font-weight: 700;
      color: var(--gray-900); margin-bottom: 8px;
    }
    .feature-card__text {
      color: var(--gray-500); font-size: .9rem; line-height: 1.6;
    }

    /* ===== Board Grid ===== */
    .board-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3,1fr); gap: 20px; }
    .board-card {
      background: var(--off-white); border: 1px solid var(--gray-100);
      border-radius: var(--radius); padding: 32px 24px; text-align: center;
      transition: transform .25s, box-shadow .25s;
    }
    .board-card:hover {
      transform: translateY(-2px);
      box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(15,26,46,.06);
    }
    .board-card--president {
      background: var(--polizei-dark);
      border-color: rgba(212,168,67,.2);
    }
    .board-card--president .board-card__name { color: var(--white); }
    .board-card--president .board-card__credentials { color: var(--gray-300); }

    .board-card__avatar {
      width: 56px; height: 56px; margin: 0 auto 16px;
      display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
      background: var(--polizei-navy); color: var(--gray-300);
      border-radius: 50%;
    }
    .board-card--president .board-card__avatar {
      background: var(--bos-gold); color: var(--polizei-dark);
    }

    .board-card__role {
      font-family: var(--font-mono); font-size: .68rem;
      letter-spacing: 1.5px; text-transform: uppercase;
      color: var(--bos-gold); margin-bottom: 8px; font-weight: 500;
    }
    .board-card__name {
      font-size: 1.05rem; font-weight: 700; color: var(--gray-900); line-height: 1.25;
    }
    .board-card__credentials {
      font-size: .78rem; color: var(--gray-300); margin-top: 4px;
    }

    /* ===== Goals ===== */
    .goals-content {
      display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
      gap: 56px; align-items: start;
    }
    .goals__statement {
      font-size: clamp(1.25rem, 2.5vw, 1.65rem);
      font-weight: 700; color: var(--white); line-height: 1.45;
    }
    .goals__statement span { color: var(--bos-gold); }

    .goals-list { list-style: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 14px; }
    .goals-list__item {
      display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 14px;
      padding: 16px 18px;
      background: rgba(255,255,255,.04);
      border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.06);
      border-radius: var(--radius);
      transition: background .2s;
    }
    .goals-list__item:hover { background: rgba(255,255,255,.07); }
    .goals-list__icon {
      flex-shrink: 0; width: 36px; height: 36px;
      display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
      background: rgba(212,168,67,.1); border-radius: var(--radius);
      color: var(--bos-gold);
    }
    .goals-list__text {
      color: var(--gray-300); font-size: .92rem; line-height: 1.5; padding-top: 6px;
    }

    /* ===== Join Section ===== */
    .join { position: relative; overflow: hidden; }
    .join__title {
      font-size: clamp(1.5rem, 3vw, 2rem);
      font-weight: 800; color: var(--gray-900);
      margin-bottom: 14px; line-height: 1.2; text-align: center;
    }
    .join__subtitle {
      color: var(--gray-500); font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.7; margin-bottom: 40px; text-align: center;
      max-width: 680px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
    }
    .join__orgs {
      display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
      gap: 16px; margin-bottom: 48px;
    }
    .join__org {
      display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 10px;
      padding: 20px 12px; background: var(--white); border-radius: var(--radius);
      border: 1px solid var(--gray-100); text-decoration: none;
      transition: all .25s ease;
    }
    .join__org:hover {
      border-color: var(--polizei-mid); box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(59,90,140,.12);
      transform: translateY(-2px);
    }
    .join__org-icon {
      width: 44px; height: 44px; border-radius: 50%;
      background: rgba(27,42,74,.08);
      display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
      flex-shrink: 0;
    }
    .join__org-icon i { width: 22px; height: 22px; color: var(--polizei-mid); }
    .join__org:hover .join__org-icon { background: var(--polizei-mid); }
    .join__org:hover .join__org-icon i { color: var(--white); }
    .join__org-name {
      font-size: .8rem; font-weight: 600; color: var(--gray-700);
      text-align: center; line-height: 1.3;
    }

    .join__divider {
      display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 16px; margin-bottom: 40px;
    }
    .join__divider::before, .join__divider::after {
      content: ''; flex: 1; height: 1px; background: var(--gray-100);
    }
    .join__divider-text {
      font-size: .78rem; font-weight: 600; color: var(--gray-300);
      text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1.5px; white-space: nowrap;
    }

    .join__foerder {
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--polizei-dark), var(--polizei-navy));
      border-radius: var(--radius); padding: 36px 32px;
      display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 24px;
      position: relative; overflow: hidden;
    }
    .join__foerder::before {
      content: ''; position: absolute; inset: 0; opacity: .03;
      background-image:
        linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,.1) 1px, transparent 1px),
        linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,.1) 1px, transparent 1px);
      background-size: 40px 40px;
    }
    .join__foerder-icon {
      width: 56px; height: 56px; border-radius: 50%;
      background: rgba(212,168,67,.15); display: flex;
      align-items: center; justify-content: center; flex-shrink: 0;
      position: relative; z-index: 1;
    }
    .join__foerder-icon i { width: 26px; height: 26px; color: var(--bos-gold); }
    .join__foerder-content { position: relative; z-index: 1; flex: 1; }
    .join__foerder-title {
      font-size: 1.05rem; font-weight: 700; color: var(--white); margin-bottom: 6px;
    }
    .join__foerder-text {
      font-size: .88rem; color: var(--gray-300); line-height: 1.6; margin-bottom: 16px;
    }
    .join__foerder .btn { position: relative; z-index: 1; }

    .join__cta {
      text-align: center; margin-top: 40px;
    }

    /* ===== Partners ===== */
    .partners { background: var(--white); border-top: 1px solid var(--gray-100); }
    .partners__label {
      text-align: center; font-size: .85rem;
      color: var(--gray-300); margin-bottom: 28px; letter-spacing: .3px;
    }
    .partners-grid { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 40px; flex-wrap: wrap; }
    .partner-item {
      display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 14px;
      padding: 20px 28px; border: 1px solid var(--gray-100);
      border-radius: var(--radius); text-decoration: none; color: var(--gray-700);
      transition: border-color .2s, box-shadow .2s;
    }
    .partner-item:hover {
      border-color: var(--polizei-mid);
      box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(15,26,46,.05);
      color: var(--polizei-navy);
    }
    .partner-item__logo { height: 36px; width: auto; }
    .partner-item__info { display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
    .partner-item__name { font-weight: 700; font-size: .95rem; }
    .partner-item__desc { font-size: .78rem; color: var(--gray-300); }

    /* ===== Footer ===== */
    .footer {
      background: var(--polizei-dark); color: var(--gray-300); padding: 56px 0 0;
    }
    .footer__inner { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 2fr 1fr 1fr; gap: 48px; }
    .footer__brand {
      display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 18px;
    }
    .footer__brand-logo { height: 40px; width: auto; border-radius: 2px; }
    .footer__brand-name {
      font-weight: 800; font-size: 1.1rem; color: var(--bos-gold); letter-spacing: .5px;
    }
    .footer__org-name {
      font-size: .84rem; line-height: 1.6;
      color: rgba(168,180,194,.6); margin-bottom: 16px;
    }
    .footer__details {
      font-size: .82rem; line-height: 1.75; color: rgba(168,180,194,.5);
    }
    .footer__details a { color: var(--bos-gold); }
    .footer__details a:hover { color: var(--bos-gold-light); }

    .footer__links-title {
      font-weight: 700; font-size: .85rem; color: var(--white);
      letter-spacing: .5px; margin-bottom: 16px; text-transform: uppercase;
    }
    .footer__link-list { list-style: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 8px; }
    .footer__link-list a {
      color: rgba(168,180,194,.5); font-size: .85rem; transition: color .2s;
    }
    .footer__link-list a:hover { color: var(--white); }

    .footer__bottom {
      margin-top: 40px; padding: 18px 0;
      border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.05);
      display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between;
      font-size: .78rem; color: rgba(168,180,194,.35);
    }

    /* ===== Responsive ===== */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
      .features { grid-template-columns: repeat(2,1fr); }
      .board-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2,1fr); }
      .goals-content { grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 36px; }
      .goals__statement { text-align: center; }
      .join__orgs { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
      .join__foerder { flex-direction: column; text-align: center; }
      .footer__inner { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
      :root { --nav-h: 60px; }
      .nav__links {
        position: fixed; top: var(--nav-h); left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0;
        background: var(--polizei-dark);
        flex-direction: column; align-items: stretch;
        padding: 16px 24px; gap: 2px;
        transform: translateX(100%);
        transition: transform .3s ease;
        overflow-y: auto;
      }
      .nav__links.open { transform: translateX(0); }
      .nav__links a { font-size: 1rem; padding: 14px 16px; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.04); }
      .nav__hamburger { display: flex; }
      .features { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
      .board-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; max-width: 400px; margin: 0 auto; }
      .section { padding: 72px 0; }
      .section__header { margin-bottom: 40px; }
      .hero { min-height: 92vh; }
      .hero__logo { width: 320px; }
      .hero__actions { flex-direction: column; align-items: center; }
      .btn { width: 100%; max-width: 280px; justify-content: center; }
      .partners-grid { flex-direction: column; gap: 16px; }
      .partner-item { width: 100%; max-width: 320px; justify-content: center; }
      .footer__bottom { flex-direction: column; gap: 6px; text-align: center; }
      .join__orgs { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
      .join__foerder { padding: 28px 20px; }
      .nav__brand-sub { display: none; }
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

  <!-- Nav -->
  <nav class="nav" id="nav" role="navigation" aria-label="Hauptnavigation">
    <div class="container nav__inner">
      <a href="#" class="nav__brand" aria-label="BOS-ARSA Startseite">
        <img src="/logo.webp?v=2" alt="BOS-ARSA Logo" class="nav__brand-logo" width="176" height="70">
        <span class="nav__brand-text">
          <span class="nav__brand-name">BOS-ARSA</span>
          <span class="nav__brand-sub">Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria</span>
        </span>
      </a>
      <button class="nav__hamburger" id="navToggle" aria-label="Menü öffnen" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="navLinks">
        <span></span><span></span><span></span>
      </button>
      <ul class="nav__links" id="navLinks">
        <li><a href="#ueber-uns">Über uns</a></li>
        <li><a href="#video">Videos</a></li>
        <li><a href="#vorstand">Vorstand</a></li>
        <li><a href="#ziele">Ziele</a></li>
        <li><a href="#mitglied">Mitglied werden</a></li>
        <li><a href="/presse.html">Presse</a></li>
        <li><a href="#kontakt">Kontakt</a></li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </nav>

  <!-- Hero -->
  <header class="hero" id="hero">
    <div class="hero__grid" aria-hidden="true"></div>
    <div class="hero__waves" aria-hidden="true">
      <div class="hero__wave"></div>
      <div class="hero__wave"></div>
      <div class="hero__wave"></div>
      <div class="hero__wave"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="hero__content">
      <img src="/logo.webp?v=2" alt="BOS-ARSA — Österreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben" class="hero__logo" width="800" height="317">
      <h1 class="hero__title">Amateurfunk im Dienst der <span>Sicherheit</span></h1>
      <p class="hero__subtitle">Der österreichische Amateurfunkverein der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben</p>
      <div class="hero__actions">
        <a href="#mitglied" class="btn btn--gold">
          <i data-lucide="user-plus" style="width:17px;height:17px;"></i>
          Mitglied werden
        </a>
        <a href="#ueber-uns" class="btn btn--outline-white">
          <i data-lucide="chevron-down" style="width:17px;height:17px;"></i>
          Mehr erfahren
        </a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </header>

  <!-- Austrian flag stripe -->
  <div class="at-stripe" aria-hidden="true"></div>

  <!-- Über uns -->
  <section class="section" id="ueber-uns">
    <div class="container">
      <div class="section__header reveal">
        <span class="section__label">Über uns</span>
        <h2 class="section__title">Wer wir sind</h2>
        <div class="section__rule"></div>
        <p class="section__intro">Der Verein bezweckt die Erhaltung, Förderung und Verbreitung des Amateurfunkwesens innerhalb des Wirkungsbereiches der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS).</p>
      </div>
      <div class="features">
        <div class="feature-card reveal">
          <div class="feature-card__icon">
            <i data-lucide="shield-check" style="width:24px;height:24px;"></i>
          </div>
          <h3 class="feature-card__title">Sicherheit</h3>
          <p class="feature-card__text">Amateurfunk als verlässliche Kommunikation für BOS-Organisationen — auch dann, wenn andere Systeme ausfallen.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-card reveal">
          <div class="feature-card__icon">
            <i data-lucide="radio-tower" style="width:24px;height:24px;"></i>
          </div>
          <h3 class="feature-card__title">Vernetzung</h3>
          <p class="feature-card__text">Verbindung von Funkamateurinnen und Funkamateuren aus Polizei, Feuerwehr und Rettung zu einer starken, übergreifenden Gemeinschaft.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-card reveal">
          <div class="feature-card__icon">
            <i data-lucide="graduation-cap" style="width:24px;height:24px;"></i>
          </div>
          <h3 class="feature-card__title">Ausbildung</h3>
          <p class="feature-card__text">Förderung der Amateurfunk-Kompetenz im BOS-Bereich durch gezielte Aus- und Weiterbildung.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>

  <!-- Video -->
  <section class="section section--alt" id="video">
    <div class="container">
      <div class="section__header reveal">
        <span class="section__label">Videos</span>
        <h2 class="section__title">Was ist BOS-ARSA?</h2>
        <div class="section__rule"></div>
        <p class="section__intro">Ein visueller Einblick in unseren Verein, unsere Ziele und unsere Arbeit im Dienst der Sicherheit.</p>
      </div>
      <div class="video-wrapper reveal">
        <video class="video-player" controls preload="metadata" poster="/logo.webp?v=2">
          <source src="/bosarsavideo.mp4" type="video/mp4">
          Dein Browser unterstützt keine Videowiedergabe.
        </video>
      </div>
      <div class="section__header reveal" style="margin-top: 3rem;">
        <h2 class="section__title">Kommunikation, wenn nichts mehr geht</h2>
        <div class="section__rule"></div>
        <p class="section__intro">BOS-ARSA – Im Sinne der Sicherheit</p>
      </div>
      <div class="video-wrapper reveal">
        <video class="video-player" controls preload="metadata" poster="/logo.webp?v=2">
          <source src="/kommunikationwennnichtsmehrgeht.mp4" type="video/mp4">
          Dein Browser unterstützt keine Videowiedergabe.
        </video>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>

  <!-- Vorstand -->
  <section class="section" id="vorstand">
    <div class="container">
      <div class="section__header reveal">
        <span class="section__label">Vorstand</span>
        <h2 class="section__title">Unser Vorstand</h2>
        <div class="section__rule"></div>
      </div>
      <div class="board-grid">
        <div class="board-card board-card--president reveal">
          <div class="board-card__avatar">
            <i data-lucide="star" style="width:24px;height:24px;"></i>
          </div>
          <div class="board-card__role">Präsident</div>
          <div class="board-card__name">Gabrutsch Wolfgang</div>
          <div class="board-card__credentials">BA MBA MBA DBA</div>
        </div>
        <div class="board-card reveal">
          <div class="board-card__avatar">
            <i data-lucide="user" style="width:22px;height:22px;"></i>
          </div>
          <div class="board-card__role">Generalsekretär</div>
          <div class="board-card__name">Londer Erich</div>
          <div class="board-card__credentials">BA</div>
        </div>
        <div class="board-card reveal">
          <div class="board-card__avatar">
            <i data-lucide="user" style="width:22px;height:22px;"></i>
          </div>
          <div class="board-card__role">Kassier</div>
          <div class="board-card__name">Ing. René Camaur</div>
        </div>
        <div class="board-card reveal">
          <div class="board-card__avatar">
            <i data-lucide="user" style="width:22px;height:22px;"></i>
          </div>
          <div class="board-card__role">Kassier Stellvertreter</div>
          <div class="board-card__name">Joham Thomas</div>
        </div>
        <div class="board-card reveal">
          <div class="board-card__avatar">
            <i data-lucide="user" style="width:22px;height:22px;"></i>
          </div>
          <div class="board-card__role">Schriftführer</div>
          <div class="board-card__name">Kugi Jürgen</div>
        </div>
        <div class="board-card reveal">

          </div>
          <div class="board-card__role">Schriftführer Stellvertreter</div>
          <div class="board-card__name">Weger Erwin</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>

  <!-- Ziele -->
  <section class="section section--dark" id="ziele">

        <span class="section__label">Unsere Ziele</span>
        <h2 class="section__title">Wofür wir stehen</h2>
        <div class="section__rule"></div>
      </div>
      <div class="goals-content">
        <div class="reveal">
          <p class="goals__statement">Förderung des <span>Amateurfunks</span> als unverzichtbares Kommunikationsmittel für <span>Sicherheitsorganisationen</span> in Österreich.</p>
        </div>
        <ul class="goals-list reveal">
          <li class="goals-list__item">
            <div class="goals-list__icon">
              <i data-lucide="radio" style="width:18px;height:18px;"></i>

          </li>

  <!-- Mitglied werden -->

      <div class="section__header reveal">

        <h2 class="join__title">Werde Teil unseres Teams</h2>
        <p class="join__subtitle">Du bist in einer BOS-Organisation tätig und hast eine Amateurfunklizenz? Dann bist du bei uns richtig! Mitglieder aus folgenden Organisationen sind bei uns willkommen:</p>
      </div>

      <div class="join__orgs reveal">
        <a href="https://www.polizei.gv.at" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="join__org">
          <div class="join__org-icon"><i data-lucide="shield"></i></div>
          <span class="join__org-name">Polizei</span>

        </a>
        <a href="https://www.samariterbund.net" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="join__org">

        </a>

          <div class="join__org-icon"><i data-lucide="swords"></i></div>

        <a href="https://www.oesterreichische-wasserrettung.at" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="join__org">
          <div class="join__org-icon"><i data-lucide="waves"></i></div>
          <span class="join__org-name">Wasserrettung</span>

        <a href="https://www.rettungshunde.at" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="join__org">

          <a href="mailto:office@bos-arsa.at" class="btn btn--gold">

            Jetzt Kontakt aufnehmen
          </a>

          </span>

          <ul class="footer__link-list">

          <div class="footer__links-title">Rechtliches & Links</div>

          </ul>

        <span>© <span id="year"></span> BOS-ARSA. Alle Rechte vorbehalten.</span>
        <span>Amateurfunk im Dienst der Sicherheit</span>
      </div>

  </footer>

  <script>
    lucide.createIcons();
    document.getElementById('year').textContent = new Date().getFullYear();

    // Nav scroll shadow
    const nav = document.getElementById('nav');
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      nav.classList.toggle('scrolled', window.scrollY > 20);
    }, { passive: true });

    // Mobile menu
    const navToggle = document.getElementById('navToggle');
    const navLinks = document.getElementById('navLinks');
    navToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const isOpen = navLinks.classList.toggle('open');
      navToggle.classList.toggle('active');
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', isOpen);
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', isOpen ? 'Menü schließen' : 'Menü öffnen');
      document.body.style.overflow = isOpen ? 'hidden' : '';
    });
    navLinks.querySelectorAll('a').forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', () => {
        navLinks.classList.remove('open');
        navToggle.classList.remove('active');
        navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
      });
    });

    // Scroll reveal
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(e => {
        if (e.isIntersecting) { e.target.classList.add('visible'); observer.unobserve(e.target); }
      });
    }, { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '0px 0px -30px 0px' });
    document.querySelectorAll('.reveal').forEach(el => observer.observe(el));

    // Stagger children
    document.querySelectorAll('.features, .board-grid').forEach(grid => {
      grid.querySelectorAll('.reveal').forEach((c, i) => { c.style.transitionDelay = `${i * .08}s`; });
    });
  </script>

file.content:
# BOS-ARSA — Österreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben

> BOS-Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria (BOS-ARSA) ist ein österreichischer Verein, der den Amateurfunk innerhalb der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS) fördert. Der Verein stellt sicher, dass Kommunikation auch dann funktioniert, wenn herkömmliche Infrastruktur ausfällt.

## Über den Verein

BOS-ARSA wurde gegründet, um den Amateurfunk als zuverlässige Notfall- und Sicherheitskommunikation in Österreich zu etablieren. Der Verein richtet sich an Mitglieder von Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS), darunter Polizei, Feuerwehr, Rettungsdienste und Katastrophenschutz.

## Zweck

Der Verein bezweckt die Erhaltung, Förderung und Verbreitung des Amateurfunkwesens innerhalb des Wirkungsbereiches der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS).

## Ziele

- Ausbildung & Lizenzierung: Unterstützung bei der Erlangung von Amateurfunklizenzen für BOS-Angehörige
- Notfallkommunikation: Aufbau redundanter Kommunikationswege für Krisensituationen
- Netzwerkaufbau: Vernetzung von Funkamateurinnen und Funkamateuren im BOS-Bereich in ganz Österreich
- Übungen & Training: Regelmäßige Funkübungen und Weiterbildungen
- Zusammenarbeit: Kooperation mit Behörden, Einsatzorganisationen und verwandten Vereinen

## Vorstand

- Obmann: Wolfgang Gabrutsch, OE8WGK
- Obmann-Stellvertreter: Patrick Holzer, OE8HPK
- Kassier: Martin Pernull, OE8MPK
- Kassier-Stellvertreterin: Elena Brandstätter, OE8ELB
- Schriftführer: Michael Linder, OE8YML
- Schriftführer-Stellvertreter: Peter Enengl, OE8PEQ

## Kontakt

- E-Mail: office@bos-arsa.at
- Sitz: c/o Wolfgang Gabrutsch, Buchengasse 3, 9020 Klagenfurt am Wörthersee, Österreich
- ZVR-Zahl: 1783847541

## Links

- Website: https://bosarsa.oeradio.at
- Domain: https://bosarsa.at (leitet weiter auf bosarsa.oeradio.at)
- BOS-ARSA Log: https://bosarsalog.oeradio.at
- Dachverband ÖVSV: https://oevsv.at

services:
  bosarsa:
    build: .
    container_name: bosarsa
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "127.0.0.1:3417:80"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "wget", "--no-verbose", "--tries=1", "--spider", "http://127.0.0.1:80/"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 5s
    networks:
      - cloudflared-tunnel

networks:
  cloudflared-tunnel:
    external: true

file.content:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -e

RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
NC='\033[0m'

# Load environment variables
if [ -f ".env.production" ]; then
    source .env.production
else
    echo -e "${RED}Error: .env.production file not found${NC}"
    exit 1
fi

# Validate required variables
REQUIRED_VARS="DEPLOY_HOST REMOTE_DIR CONTAINER_NAME IMAGE_NAME CONTAINER_PORT SITE_URL"
for var in $REQUIRED_VARS; do
    if [ -z "${!var}" ]; then
        echo -e "${RED}Error: $var is not set in .env.production${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
done

# Check for --rebuild flag
REBUILD_FLAG=""
if [ "$1" == "--rebuild" ]; then
    REBUILD_FLAG="--no-cache"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}Rebuild flag set — will build without cache${NC}"
fi

echo -e "${GREEN}=== Deploying BOS-ARSA to $DEPLOY_HOST ===${NC}"
echo "Host: $DEPLOY_HOST"
echo "Remote dir: $REMOTE_DIR"
echo "Container: $CONTAINER_NAME"
echo "Port: $CONTAINER_PORT"
echo ""

# Step 1: Ensure remote directory exists and sync files
echo -e "${GREEN}Step 1: Syncing files...${NC}"
ssh "$DEPLOY_HOST" "mkdir -p '$REMOTE_DIR'"
rsync -avz --delete \
    --exclude '.git' \
    --exclude '.env.production' \
    ./ "$DEPLOY_HOST:$REMOTE_DIR/"

# Step 2: Build and start container
echo -e "${GREEN}Step 2: Building and starting container...${NC}"
ssh "$DEPLOY_HOST" "
    cd '$REMOTE_DIR'
    docker build $REBUILD_FLAG -t '$IMAGE_NAME' .
    docker compose up -d --force-recreate --build
"

# Step 3: Verify deployment
echo -e "${GREEN}Step 3: Verifying deployment...${NC}"
sleep 3

CONTAINER_STATUS=$(ssh "$DEPLOY_HOST" "docker ps --filter 'name=$CONTAINER_NAME' --format '{{.Status}}'")
echo "Container status: $CONTAINER_STATUS"

LOCAL_PORT=$(echo $CONTAINER_PORT | cut -d: -f1)
if ssh "$DEPLOY_HOST" "curl -sf -o /dev/null http://localhost:$LOCAL_PORT"; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}✓ Container is running on port $LOCAL_PORT${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}⚠ Container not yet responding on port $LOCAL_PORT${NC}"
fi

if curl -sf -o /dev/null "$SITE_URL" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}✓ Site is accessible at $SITE_URL${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}⚠ Public URL not yet accessible — configure Cloudflare tunnel${NC}"
fi

echo ""
echo -e "${GREEN}=== Deployment complete ===${NC}"

content.text: Now the base layout and all page templates.

input.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="de">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>{{ title }}</title>
  <meta name="description" content="{{ description }}">
  {% if keywords %}<meta name="keywords" content="{{ keywords }}">{% endif %}
  <meta name="author" content="BOS-ARSA">
  <meta name="robots" content="index, follow">
  <link rel="canonical" href="{{ canonical }}">
  <!-- Open Graph -->
  <meta property="og:title" content="{{ title }}">
  <meta property="og:description" content="{{ ogDescription | default(description) }}">
  <meta property="og:type" content="website">
  <meta property="og:url" content="{{ canonical }}">
  <meta property="og:locale" content="de_AT">
  <meta property="og:site_name" content="BOS-ARSA">
  <meta property="og:image" content="{{ site.url }}/logo.webp?v=2">
  <meta property="og:image:width" content="800">
  <meta property="og:image:height" content="316">
  <meta property="og:image:alt" content="BOS-ARSA Logo">
  <!-- Twitter Card -->
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
  <meta name="twitter:title" content="{{ title }}">
  <meta name="twitter:description" content="{{ ogDescription | default(description) }}">
  <meta name="twitter:image" content="{{ site.url }}/logo.webp?v=2">
  {% block structuredData %}{% endblock %}
  <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="/favicon-96x96.png" sizes="96x96">
  <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/favicon.svg">
  <link rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico">
  <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="/apple-touch-icon.png">
  <link rel="manifest" href="/site.webmanifest">
  <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest"></script>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/base.css">
  {% block pageCSS %}{% endblock %}
</head>
<body>

  {% include "nav.njk" %}

  {% block content %}{% endblock %}

  {% include "footer.njk" %}

  <script>
    lucide.createIcons();
    document.getElementById('year').textContent = new Date().getFullYear();

    // Nav scroll shadow
    const nav = document.getElementById('nav');
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      nav.classList.toggle('scrolled', window.scrollY > 20);
    }, { passive: true });

    // Mobile menu
    const navToggle = document.getElementById('navToggle');
    const navLinks = document.getElementById('navLinks');
    navToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const isOpen = navLinks.classList.toggle('open');
      navToggle.classList.toggle('active');
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', isOpen);
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', isOpen ? 'Menü schließen' : 'Menü öffnen');
      document.body.style.overflow = isOpen ? 'hidden' : '';
    });
    navLinks.querySelectorAll('a').forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', () => {
        navLinks.classList.remove('open');
        navToggle.classList.remove('active');
        navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
      });
    });

    // Scroll reveal
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(e => {
        if (e.isIntersecting) { e.target.classList.add('visible'); observer.unobserve(e.target); }
      });
    }, { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '0px 0px -30px 0px' });
    document.querySelectorAll('.reveal').forEach(el => observer.observe(el));

    // Stagger children
    document.querySelectorAll('.features, .board-grid').forEach(grid => {
      grid.querySelectorAll('.reveal').forEach((c, i) => { c.style.transitionDelay = `${i * .08}s`; });
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>

input.content:
---
permalink: /llms.txt
eleventyExcludeFromCollections: true
---
# {{ site.name }} — {{ site.fullName }}

> {{ site.legalName }} ist ein österreichischer Verein, der den Amateurfunk innerhalb der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS) fördert. Der Verein stellt sicher, dass Kommunikation auch dann funktioniert, wenn herkömmliche Infrastruktur ausfällt.

## Über den Verein

BOS-ARSA wurde gegründet, um den Amateurfunk als zuverlässige Notfall- und Sicherheitskommunikation in Österreich zu etablieren. Der Verein richtet sich an Mitglieder von Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS), darunter Polizei, Feuerwehr, Rettungsdienste und Katastrophenschutz.

## Zweck

Der Verein bezweckt die Erhaltung, Förderung und Verbreitung des Amateurfunkwesens innerhalb des Wirkungsbereiches der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS).

## Ziele

- Ausbildung & Lizenzierung: Unterstützung bei der Erlangung von Amateurfunklizenzen für BOS-Angehörige
- Notfallkommunikation: Aufbau redundanter Kommunikationswege für Krisensituationen
- Netzwerkaufbau: Vernetzung von Funkamateurinnen und Funkamateuren im BOS-Bereich in ganz Österreich
- Übungen & Training: Regelmäßige Funkübungen und Weiterbildungen
- Zusammenarbeit: Kooperation mit Behörden, Einsatzorganisationen und verwandten Vereinen

## Vorstand

- Obmann: Wolfgang Gabrutsch, OE8WGK
- Obmann-Stellvertreter: Patrick Holzer, OE8HPK
- Kassier: Martin Pernull, OE8MPK
- Kassier-Stellvertreterin: Elena Brandstätter, OE8ELB
- Schriftführer: Michael Linder, OE8YML
- Schriftführer-Stellvertreter: Peter Enengl, OE8PEQ

## Kontakt

- E-Mail: {{ site.email }}
- Sitz: {{ site.address.care }}, {{ site.address.street }}, {{ site.address.zip }} {{ site.address.city }}, {{ site.address.country }}
- ZVR-Zahl: {{ site.zvr }}

## Links

- Website: {{ site.url }}
- Domain: https://bosarsa.at (leitet weiter auf bosarsa.oeradio.at)
- BOS-ARSA Log: https://bosarsalog.oeradio.at
- Dachverband ÖVSV: https://oevsv.at

COPY . .

EXPOSE 80

file.content:
# BOS-ARSA — Österreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben

> BOS-Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria (BOS-ARSA) ist ein österreichischer Verein, der den Amateurfunk innerhalb der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS) fördert. Der Verein stellt sicher, dass Kommunikation auch dann funktioniert, wenn herkömmliche Infrastruktur ausfällt.

## Über den Verein

BOS-ARSA wurde gegründet, um den Amateurfunk als zuverlässige Notfall- und Sicherheitskommunikation in Österreich zu etablieren. Der Verein richtet sich an Mitglieder von Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS), darunter Polizei, Feuerwehr, Rettungsdienste und Katastrophenschutz.

## Zweck

Der Verein bezweckt die Erhaltung, Förderung und Verbreitung des Amateurfunkwesens innerhalb des Wirkungsbereiches der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS).

## Ziele

- Ausbildung & Lizenzierung: Unterstützung bei der Erlangung von Amateurfunklizenzen für BOS-Angehörige
- Notfallkommunikation: Aufbau redundanter Kommunikationswege für Krisensituationen
- Netzwerkaufbau: Vernetzung von Funkamateurinnen und Funkamateuren im BOS-Bereich in ganz Österreich
- Übungen & Training: Regelmäßige Funkübungen und Weiterbildungen
- Zusammenarbeit: Kooperation mit Behörden, Einsatzorganisationen und verwandten Vereinen

## Vorstand

- Obmann: Wolfgang Gabrutsch, OE8WGK
- Obmann-Stellvertreter: Patrick Holzer, OE8HPK
- Kassier: Martin Pernull, OE8MPK
- Kassier-Stellvertreterin: Elena Brandstätter, OE8ELB
- Schriftführer: Michael Linder, OE8YML
- Schriftführer-Stellvertreter: Peter Enengl, OE8PEQ

## Kontakt

- E-Mail: office@bos-arsa.at
- Sitz: c/o Wolfgang Gabrutsch, Buchengasse 3, 9020 Klagenfurt am Wörthersee, Österreich
- ZVR-Zahl: 1783847541

## Links

- Website: https://bosarsa.oeradio.at
- Domain: https://bosarsa.at (leitet weiter auf bosarsa.oeradio.at)
- BOS-ARSA Log: https://bosarsalog.oeradio.at
- Dachverband ÖVSV: https://oevsv.at

content.thinking:
The content block is empty on the presse page. The issue is that Nunjucks `{% block %}` in Eleventy with layouts works differently. In Eleventy with Nunjucks, the child template needs to use `{% extends %}` instead of front matter layout to use blocks. When using front matter `layout`, the content is passed as `content` variable, not as blocks.

Let me reconsider the approach. In Eleventy, when you use `layout` in front matter, the child template's rendered content is placed in `{{ content | safe }}` in the layout. Block inheritance with `{% block %}` / `{% extends %}` is a different Nunjucks feature.


I'm realizing I need to pick between two approaches: either use `{{ content | safe }}` in the base layout and pass page-specific CSS and structured data through front matter variables, or switch to `{% extends %}` in child templates instead of relying on front matter layouts. The front matter approach is simpler for Eleventy, so I'll go with passing those extras as data variables rather than trying to use blocks. I'm realizing the core issue: page-specific CSS and structured data need to live in the `<head>`, but if I put them in the content block, they'll end up in the `<body>`. The cleanest solution is to pass these as front matter variables and have the base template conditionally render them in the right place—either as separate CSS files or as inline styles and scripts that the base template injects into the head. Putting `<style>` tags in the body risks a flash of unstyled content, so that's not ideal. Instead, I'll use Eleventy's conditional front matter approach—adding checks in base.njk for `structuredData` and `pageCSSFile` variables in the head section, then creating a dedicated CSS file for the index page.

For the structured data, I can inline the JSON-LD script tag directly in the page content since browsers handle that fine in the body. Let me go with the straightforward solution: separate CSS file for homepage styles and structured data embedded in the content.

Actually, I should leverage Eleventy's patterns properly—I'll set up the base template to conditionally link extra CSS files and render structured data based on front matter flags, then implement this approach now.

input.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="de">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>{{ title }}</title>
  <meta name="description" content="{{ description }}">
  {% if keywords %}<meta name="keywords" content="{{ keywords }}">{% endif %}
  <meta name="author" content="BOS-ARSA">
  <meta name="robots" content="index, follow">
  <link rel="canonical" href="{{ canonical }}">
  <!-- Open Graph -->
  <meta property="og:title" content="{{ title }}">
  <meta property="og:description" content="{{ ogDescription | default(description) }}">
  <meta property="og:type" content="website">
  <meta property="og:url" content="{{ canonical }}">
  <meta property="og:locale" content="de_AT">
  <meta property="og:site_name" content="BOS-ARSA">
  <meta property="og:image" content="{{ site.url }}/logo.webp?v=2">
  <meta property="og:image:width" content="800">
  <meta property="og:image:height" content="316">
  <meta property="og:image:alt" content="BOS-ARSA Logo">
  <!-- Twitter Card -->
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
  <meta name="twitter:title" content="{{ title }}">
  <meta name="twitter:description" content="{{ ogDescription | default(description) }}">
  <meta name="twitter:image" content="{{ site.url }}/logo.webp?v=2">
  {% if structuredData %}
  <!-- Structured Data -->
  <script type="application/ld+json">
  {{ structuredData | dump | safe }}
  </script>
  {% endif %}
  <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="/favicon-96x96.png" sizes="96x96">
  <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/favicon.svg">
  <link rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico">
  <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="/apple-touch-icon.png">
  <link rel="manifest" href="/site.webmanifest">
  <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest"></script>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/base.css">
  {% if pageCSSFile %}<link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ pageCSSFile }}">{% endif %}
</head>
<body>

  {% include "nav.njk" %}

  {{ content | safe }}

  {% include "footer.njk" %}

  <script>
    lucide.createIcons();
    document.getElementById('year').textContent = new Date().getFullYear();

    // Nav scroll shadow
    const nav = document.getElementById('nav');
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      nav.classList.toggle('scrolled', window.scrollY > 20);
    }, { passive: true });

    // Mobile menu
    const navToggle = document.getElementById('navToggle');
    const navLinks = document.getElementById('navLinks');
    navToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const isOpen = navLinks.classList.toggle('open');
      navToggle.classList.toggle('active');
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', isOpen);
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', isOpen ? 'Menü schließen' : 'Menü öffnen');
      document.body.style.overflow = isOpen ? 'hidden' : '';
    });
    navLinks.querySelectorAll('a').forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', () => {
        navLinks.classList.remove('open');
        navToggle.classList.remove('active');
        navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
      });
    });

    // Scroll reveal
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(e => {
        if (e.isIntersecting) { e.target.classList.add('visible'); observer.unobserve(e.target); }
      });
    }, { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '0px 0px -30px 0px' });
    document.querySelectorAll('.reveal').forEach(el => observer.observe(el));

    // Stagger children
    document.querySelectorAll('.features, .board-grid').forEach(grid => {
      grid.querySelectorAll('.reveal').forEach((c, i) => { c.style.transitionDelay = `${i * .08}s`; });
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>

      entries.forEach(e => {
        if (e.isIntersecting) { e.target.classList.add('visible'); observer.unobserve(e.target); }
      });
    }, { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '0px 0px -30px 0px' });
    document.querySelectorAll('.reveal').forEach(el => observer.observe(el));

    // Stagger children
    document.querySelectorAll('.features, .board-grid').forEach(grid => {
      grid.querySelectorAll('.reveal').forEach((c, i) => { c.style.transitionDelay = `${i * .08}s`; });
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="de">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>{{ title }}</title>
  <meta name="description" content="{{ description }}">
  {% if keywords %}<meta name="keywords" content="{{ keywords }}">{% endif %}
  <meta name="author" content="BOS-ARSA">
  <meta name="robots" content="index, follow">
  <link rel="canonical" href="{{ canonical }}">
  <!-- Open Graph -->
  <meta property="og:title" content="{{ title }}">
  <meta property="og:description" content="{{ ogDescription | default(description) }}">
  <meta property="og:type" content="website">
  <meta property="og:url" content="{{ canonical }}">
  <meta property="og:locale" content="de_AT">
  <meta property="og:site_name" content="BOS-ARSA">
  <meta property="og:image" content="{{ site.url }}/logo.webp?v=2">
  <meta property="og:image:width" content="800">
  <meta property="og:image:height" content="316">
  <meta property="og:image:alt" content="BOS-ARSA Logo">
  <!-- Twitter Card -->
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
  <meta name="twitter:title" content="{{ title }}">
  <meta name="twitter:description" content="{{ ogDescription | default(description) }}">
  <meta name="twitter:image" content="{{ site.url }}/logo.webp?v=2">
  {% block structuredData %}{% endblock %}
  <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="/favicon-96x96.png" sizes="96x96">
  <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/favicon.svg">
  <link rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico">
  <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="/apple-touch-icon.png">
  <link rel="manifest" href="/site.webmanifest">
  <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest"></script>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="/css/base.css">
  {% block pageCSS %}{% endblock %}
</head>
<body>

  {% include "nav.njk" %}

  {% block content %}{% endblock %}

  {% include "footer.njk" %}

  <script>
    lucide.createIcons();
    document.getElementById('year').textContent = new Date().getFullYear();

    // Nav scroll shadow
    const nav = document.getElementById('nav');
    window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
      nav.classList.toggle('scrolled', window.scrollY > 20);
    }, { passive: true });

    // Mobile menu
    const navToggle = document.getElementById('navToggle');
    const navLinks = document.getElementById('navLinks');
    navToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const isOpen = navLinks.classList.toggle('open');
      navToggle.classList.toggle('active');
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', isOpen);
      navToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', isOpen ? 'Menü schließen' : 'Menü öffnen');
      document.body.style.overflow = isOpen ? 'hidden' : '';
    });
    navLinks.querySelectorAll('a').forEach(link => {
      link.addEventListener('click', () => {
        navLinks.classList.remove('open');
        navToggle.classList.remove('active');
        navToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
      });
    });

    // Scroll reveal
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
      entries.forEach(e => {
        if (e.isIntersecting) { e.target.classList.add('visible'); observer.unobserve(e.target); }
      });
    }, { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '0px 0px -30px 0px' });
    document.querySelectorAll('.reveal').forEach(el => observer.observe(el));

    // Stagger children
    document.querySelectorAll('.features, .board-grid').forEach(grid => {
      grid.querySelectorAll('.reveal').forEach((c, i) => { c.style.transitionDelay = `${i * .08}s`; });
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>

Kommunikation, wenn nichts mehr geht." activeNav: home pageCSSFile: "/css/index.css" permalink: /index.html structuredData: "@context": "https://schema.org" "@type": "Organization" name: "BOS-ARSA" alternateName: "BOS-Amateur-Radio-Society-Austria" description: "Österreichischer Amateurfunkverein der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben" url: "https://bosarsa.oeradio.at" logo: "https://bosarsa.oeradio.at/logo.webp?v=2" email: "office@bos-arsa.at" address: "@type": "PostalAddress" streetAddress: "Buchengasse 3" addressLocality: "Klagenfurt am Wörthersee" postalCode: "9020" addressCountry: "AT" sameAs: - "https://bosarsa.at" - "https://bosarsalog.oeradio.at" foundingLocation: "@type": "Place" name: "Klagenfurt am Wörthersee, Österreich" memberOf: "@type": "Organization" name: "ÖVSV" url: "https://oevsv.at" ---

Amateurfunk im Dienst der Sicherheit

Der österreichische Amateurfunkverein der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben

Mitglied werden Mehr erfahren
Über uns

Wer wir sind

Der Verein bezweckt die Erhaltung, Förderung und Verbreitung des Amateurfunkwesens innerhalb des Wirkungsbereiches der Behörden und Organisationen mit Sicherheitsaufgaben (BOS).

Sicherheit

Amateurfunk als verlässliche Kommunikation für BOS-Organisationen — auch dann, wenn andere Systeme ausfallen.

Vernetzung

Verbindung von Funkamateurinnen und Funkamateuren aus Polizei, Feuerwehr und Rettung zu einer starken, übergreifenden Gemeinschaft.

Ausbildung

Förderung der Amateurfunk-Kompetenz im BOS-Bereich durch gezielte Aus- und Weiterbildung.

Videos

Was ist BOS-ARSA?

Ein visueller Einblick in unseren Verein, unsere Ziele und unsere Arbeit im Dienst der Sicherheit.

Kommunikation, wenn nichts mehr geht

BOS-ARSA – Im Sinne der Sicherheit

Vorstand

Unser Vorstand

Präsident
Gabrutsch Wolfgang
BA MBA MBA DBA
Generalsekretär
Londer Erich
BA
Kassier
Ing. René Camaur
Kassier Stellvertreter
Joham Thomas
Schriftführer
Kugi Jürgen
Schriftführer Stellvertreter
Weger Erwin
Unsere Ziele

Wofür wir stehen

Förderung des Amateurfunks als unverzichtbares Kommunikationsmittel für Sicherheitsorganisationen in Österreich.

  • Förderung des Amateurfunks in BOS-Organisationen
  • Ausbildung und Weiterbildung von Funkamateurinnen und Funkamateuren
  • Zusammenarbeit mit nationalen und internationalen Organisationen
  • Unterstützung der Notfallkommunikation
Mitglied werden

Werde Teil unseres Teams

Du bist in einer BOS-Organisation tätig und hast eine Amateurfunklizenz? Dann bist du bei uns richtig! Mitglieder aus folgenden Organisationen sind bei uns willkommen:

Polizei
Feuerwehr
Rotes Kreuz
Samariterbund
Bundesheer
Wasserrettung
Rettungshunde­staffel
Bergrettung
oder
Förderndes Mitglied werden

Du bist in keiner BOS-Organisation tätig, möchtest aber unsere Arbeit unterstützen? Dann werde förderndes Mitglied und hilf uns, sichere Kommunikation in Österreich zu stärken.

Jetzt Kontakt aufnehmen

Mit freundlicher Unterstützung von

safeREACH.com Alarmierungslösung

input.content:
# BOS-ARSA Project Memory

## Tech Stack
- **SSG**: Eleventy (11ty) v3.1.2 with Nunjucks templates
- **Deployment**: Docker multi-stage (node build -> nginx serve), Cloudflare tunnel
- **Node**: Available via `nix-shell -p nodejs_20` (NixOS system)

## Project Structure
- `src/` — Eleventy source (templates, data, CSS)
- `src/_data/site.json` — Global site data (name, address, ZVR, etc.)
- `src/_data/presse.json` — Press articles array (data-driven)
- `src/_includes/base.njk` — Main layout (uses `{{ content | safe }}`)
- `src/_includes/nav.njk` — Navigation partial
- `src/_includes/footer.njk` — Footer partial
- `src/css/base.css` — Shared styles (nav, footer, typography, variables)
- `src/css/index.css` — Homepage-specific styles (hero, features, board, etc.)
- Static assets: `fonts/`, `favicon/`, `*.mp4`, `*.webp`, `*.png` in project root

## Key Patterns
- Eleventy layout system uses `{{ content | safe }}`, NOT Nunjucks `{% block %}` inheritance
- Page-specific CSS via `pageCSSFile` front matter variable
- Structured data via `structuredData` front matter (YAML object, rendered with `dump | safe`)
- Nav prefix logic: `activeNav: "home"` → `#` anchors, other pages → `/#` anchors
- SEO files (robots.txt, sitemap.xml, llms.txt) generated from templates with `eleventyExcludeFromCollections: true`

## Build
```bash
nix-shell -p nodejs_20 --run "npx @11ty/eleventy"
```
Output: `_site/` directory

# BOS-ARSA Project Memory

## Tech Stack
- **SSG**: Eleventy (11ty) v3.1.2 with Nunjucks templates
- **Deployment**: Docker multi-stage (node build -> nginx serve), Cloudflare tunnel
- **Node**: Available via `nix-shell -p nodejs_20` (NixOS system)

## Project Structure
- `src/` — Eleventy source (templates, data, CSS)
- `src/_data/site.json` — Global site data (name, address, ZVR, etc.)
- `src/_data/presse.json` — Press articles array (data-driven)
- `src/_includes/base.njk` — Main layout (uses `{{ content | safe }}`)
- `src/_includes/nav.njk` — Navigation partial
- `src/_includes/footer.njk` — Footer partial
- `src/css/base.css` — Shared styles (nav, footer, typography, variables)
- `src/css/index.css` — Homepage-specific styles (hero, features, board, etc.)
- Static assets: `fonts/`, `favicon/`, `*.mp4`, `*.webp`, `*.png` in project root

## Key Patterns
- Eleventy layout system uses `{{ content | safe }}`, NOT Nunjucks `{% block %}` inheritance
- Page-specific CSS via `pageCSSFile` front matter variable
- Structured data via `structuredData` front matter (YAML object, rendered with `dump | safe`)
- Nav prefix logic: `activeNav: "home"` → `#` anchors, other pages → `/#` anchors
- SEO files (robots.txt, sitemap.xml, llms.txt) generated from templates with `eleventyExcludeFromCollections: true`

## Build
```bash
nix-shell -p nodejs_20 --run "npx @11ty/eleventy"
```
Output: `_site/` directory

content.text:
Migration complete. Here's a summary of what was done:

## Completed

**Created Eleventy project structure:**
- `.eleventy.js` — Config (input: `src/`, output: `_site/`, passthrough copy for static assets)
- `package.json` — With `build` and `dev` scripts
- `src/_data/site.json` — Single source of truth for org details
- `src/_data/presse.json` — 6 press articles as data (add article = add JSON entry)
- `src/css/base.css` — All shared styles (fonts, nav, footer, typography, variables, responsive)
- `src/css/index.css` — Homepage-specific styles (hero, features, board, goals, join, partners)
- `src/_includes/base.njk` — Layout with head, nav, footer, JS
- `src/_includes/nav.njk` — Navigation partial (smart `#` vs `/#` prefix)
- `src/_includes/footer.njk` — Footer partial (pulls from `site.json`)

**Converted 4 pages:**
- `src/index.njk` — Homepage with structured data via front matter
- `src/presse.njk` — Data-driven loop over `presse.json` (replaces 6 copy-pasted cards)
- `src/impressum.njk` — Now gets full nav/footer from shared includes
- `src/datenschutz.njk` — Now gets full nav/footer from shared includes

**Generated SEO files:**
- `src/robots.njk` → `robots.txt`
- `src/sitemap.njk` → `sitemap.xml`
- `src/llms.njk` → `llms.txt`

**Updated infrastructure:**
- `Dockerfile` — Multi-stage build (node → nginx)
- `.gitignore` — Added `_site/`, `node_modules/`

**Deleted old files:** All 4 root HTML files + `robots.txt`, `sitemap.xml`, `llms.txt`

**Build output:** 7 files written, 17 static assets copied in 0.21s

content.text:
Yes, Eleventy is live. The deployment just completed successfully:

- The multi-stage Dockerfile built the site with `npx @11ty/eleventy` in the node stage
- Copied `_site/` output to the nginx container
- Container is running and healthy
- Site confirmed accessible at `https://bosarsa.oeradio.at/`

The old static HTML files were deleted and replaced by Eleventy-generated output. Visitors see the exact same site — the only difference is how it's built.

message.content: not deployed, as presse.html still exists on prod

content.text: [Request interrupted by user]

message.content: do not want to have html files ... like presse.html... can we /presse instead

content.thinking:
The user wants clean URLs without `.html` extensions. So instead of `/presse.html` it should be `/presse`, `/impressum` instead of `/impressum.html`, etc.

In Eleventy, this is done by outputting each page as a directory with an `index.html` inside. For example, `/presse/index.html` gets served as `/presse` by nginx.

I need to:
1. Update permalinks in all page templates (presse, impressum, datenschutz)
2. Update all internal links (nav, footer, sitemap) to drop `.html`
3. The index page stays at `/index.html` (root)


4. Configure nginx to handle the directory-based routing with `try_files $uri $uri/ =404` so requests to `/presse` properly resolve to `/presse/index.html`

Now I'm updating the page templates to use trailing slash permalinks like `/presse/` and `/impressum/` so Eleventy outputs them as index files in their respective directories.

I need to update the navigation and footer links, refresh the sitemap with the new URLs, and make sure the canonical URLs in the front matter match the clean URL structure. The homepage stays as the default `/index.html`, and since we're migrating away from `.html` extensions entirely, the old files won't exist anymore.

content.text: I'll update everything for clean URLs (`/presse` instead of `/presse.html`).

input.command:
git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Auf Eleventy (11ty) migrieren mit Clean URLs

Statische HTML-Dateien durch Nunjucks-Templates ersetzt. Gemeinsames
Layout (nav, footer, CSS, JS) in _includes, Presseartikel datengetrieben
aus presse.json, SEO-Dateien generiert. Clean URLs ohne .html-Endung,
alte URLs leiten per 301 weiter. Dockerfile auf Multi-Stage-Build
(node → nginx) umgestellt.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
